name: Lose the Spook
description:
You are being haunted by a ghost. Fortunately, there are some Deghosting relics around here; bringing three to the Purifying Circle should be enough to get rid of any haunting at all! This game has 3 different endings.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys/D-pad/Left Stick: move
  • Z key/A button: attack

(Controls presented for US QWERTY keyboard layout and XBox style controller.)
